attributes.comment:
My concern for the increase would be that the gathering of these fees would not
necessarily go to the increase of processing time and service but instead to
unclear or undefined areas as in the wording of the document. Additionally, what
combined fees is this unifying, and why not mention those fees?

Finally, I believe that any fee should be updated, but what will the effect be to
those already in process or who have paid the initial fee and are waiting approval?
Will they be required to pay an additional fee, the difference, or possibly the whole
amount in its newer full sum?
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Terry McCammon
